00045 class XmlParserRel : public XMLParser {
00046     public :
00047         // For readability of code 
00048         enum RelTag_v1_0 {
00049             RelTagKeyInfo = 0 ,
00050             RelTagKeyValue,
00051             RelTagCount,
00052             RelTagDatetime,
00053             RelTagDisplay,
00054             RelTagEnd,
00055             RelTagExecute,
00056             RelTagInterval,
00057             RelTagPlay,
00058             RelTagPrint,
00059             RelTagStart,
00060             RelTagUid,
00061             RelTagVersion,
00062             RelTagAgreement,
00063             RelTagAsset,
00064             RelTagConstraint,
00065             RelTagContext,
00066             RelTagPermission,
00067             RelTagRights,
00068             RelTagNone
00069         };
00070 
00071         XmlParserRel(CHAR *s,DrmRelParser& rh) : XMLParser(s), m_ro (rh.m_ro), m_rel_parser(&rh)
00072         {                       
00073             m_perm = 0;
00074             m_constraint = 0;
00075             m_permission_depth = 0;
00076             m_constraint_depth = 0;
00077             m_data_depth = 0;
00078             m_unknowntag = 0;

00080         }

00108         DrmConstraint*  m_constraint;       // Pointer to constraint
00109         INT m_permission_depth;         // Depth of permission tag if any - default 0
00110         INT m_constraint_depth;         // Depth of constraint tag if any - default 0
00111         INT m_data_depth;                   // Depth of count,datetime etc tag if any - default 0
